thread.title_full: pCloud Launches pCloud Crypto for Web and а $20,000 Hacking Challenge

author: Maria Goulisheva
title: pCloud Launches pCloud Crypto Web а $20,000 Hacking Challenge
text:
Cloud storage provider pCloud officially introduced pCloud Crypto for Web. pCloud Crypto, originally an additional file security feature of the desktop application pCloud Drive and the mobile apps for Android and iOS, is now available for Web. This solution utilizes client-side encryption with which no one except the users themselves can see their data, file names and contents. Accessing the encrypted files in the apps has been simplified to only typing a personal passcode, called "Crypto pass".
"Our pCloud Crypto desktop and mobile applications take the advantage of client-side encryption and we are very happy that now we can offer it in the Web browser too" said pCloud's CEO Tunio Zafer. “pCloud Crypto for web is ensuring that pCloud users can access their encrypted data on all platforms and devices “.
pCloud Crypto acts as a zero-knowledge privacy folder where users can store as many sensitive files as needed. Because only the users know their Crypto pass, not even the service provider has access to what’s inside.
 pCloud Crypto visit https://www.pcloud.com/encrypt-your-sensitive-files-in-the-cloud.html
Together with the announcement of the Crypto service for Web, Tunio Zafer announced a 90 days hacking challenge. pCloud offered to pay $20,000 to the hacker that can break into its pCloud Crypto service in the next three months.
“We are so confident of the security of our client-side encryption service that we offer $20,000 to the hacker that can prove us wrong” said Tunio Zafer.
 pCloud hacking challenge visit https://www.pcloud.com/challenge/ .
About pCloud
pCloud is one of the most innovative cloud storage services on the market. Established by a group of IT specialists and global entrepreneurs, the company provides a reliable solution for both individuals and businesses. The service's differentiates itself with a solid combination of multi-platform accessibility, strong security measures and easy file sharing options. pCloud's main advantage lies in its advanced desktop application – pCloud Drive and its client-side encryption capability – pCloud Crypto. It allows for files to be stored entirely on a cloud-based external hard drive, allowing for increased PC productivity.
pCloud is available in the App Store, in Google Play and at http://www.pcloud.com .
